name: Naukri Internet Services Pvt
overview:
Naukri Internet Services Pvt., Ltd., a careers Web site, offers a forum for employers, placement agencies, and job seekers to exchange information on the Internet. It offers resume listing, which enables job seekers to register and include resumes on the resume database; resume display, which enables the posted resumes to be displayed to the employers and recruitment consultants on the Web site; resume flash, a service that enables the resumes to be forwarded to a select group of recruitment consultants, search firms, and placement agencies located in Indian cities; and job mail, an email service that sends emails to job seekers informing about vacancies. The company also offers recruitment advertising, which provides job vacancy posting services and advertising space; classified listings; vacancies; job gallery; access to resume database, a service that enables requirements to be matched with the resumes stored in the database; response management, a service that allows the use of the “e-apps” software, a software to screen applications for given job; and campaigns, which sends mass job alert emails. It serves the clients located in the United States, Africa, the Middle East, and the Far East.

Naukri Internet Services Pvt., Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Noida, India. The company has additional offices in India and Dubai. Naukri Internet Services Pvt., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of Info Edge (India), Ltd.
